title: undhan padham vENDinEn
sahitya:
undan padam vENDinEn muruganE!

kanda vaDi vElanE mAl maruganE !  

anupallavi

endai shiva pArvatiyum magizhum sendEnE!

cindai kavar rEvati rAga vinOdane!  

caraNam  

mundaip piRavip piNi agaRRiDum sAdanamE

endanai AL skanda gAnamE

vandanai sey Atma nivEdanamE

santatam aruLum endan shanmukha deyvamE
